Test.Name: ptz6: Correct response
Test.Description: Check GENERIC PAN/TILT VELOCITY SPACE test when DUT return correct response.

Test.Name: No ContinuousZoomVelocitySpace
Test.Description: Check GENERIC PAN/TILT VELOCITY SPACE test when DUT return node without ContinuousZoomVelocitySpace.

Test.Name: Not Generic ContinuousZoomVelocitySpace
Test.Description: Check GENERIC PAN/TILT VELOCITY SPACE test when DUT return not generic ContinuousZoomVelocitySpace.

Test.Name: Several nodes
Test.Description: Check GENERIC PAN/TILT VELOCITY SPACE test when DUT return several nodes.

Test.Name: ContinuousZoomVelocitySpace without Range
Test.Description: Check GENERIC PAN/TILT VELOCITY SPACE test when DUT return ContinuousZoomVelocitySpace without Range.
